column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Arnook says : " Master Pakku , meet your newest student , the Avatar . "
#Text=Pakku says : " Just because you 're destined to save the world , do n't expect any special treatment . "
#Text=Aang says : " My friend and I ca n't wait to start training with you !
#Text=If not , I 'll see you both at sunrise .
#Text=Good night .
#Text=" Zuko says : " For the last time , I 'm not playing the tsungi horn !
#Text=" Iroh says : " No , it 's about our plans .
#Text=There 's a bit of a problem .
#Text=" Zhao says : " I 'm taking your crew .
#Text=" Zuko says : " What ?!
#Text=" Zhao says : " I 've recruited them for a little expedition to the North Pole .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uncle , is that true ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm afraid so .
#Text=He 's taking everyone ... even the cook .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Sorry you wo n't be there to watch me capture the Avatar .
#Text=But I ca n't have you getting in my way again .
#Text=" Iroh says : " No !
#Text=" Zhao says : " I did n't know you were skilled with broadswords , Prince Zuko .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm not .
#Text=They 're antiques .
#Text=Just decorative .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Have you heard of the Blue Spirit , General Iroh ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Just rumors .
#Text=I do n't think he is real .
#Text=" Zhao says : " He 's real , all right .
#Text=He 's a criminal , and an enemy of the Fire Nation .
#Text=But I have a feeling justice will catch up with him soon .
#Text=General Iroh , the offer to join my mission still stands ... if you change your mind .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 've waited for this day my whole life .
#Text=I finally get to learn from a real waterbending master !
#Text=" Aang says : " Good morning , Master Pakku !
#Text=" Pakku says : " No , please , march right in .
#Text=I 'm not concentrating or anything .
#Text=" Aang says : " Uhhh ... This is my friend , Katara .
#Text=The one I told you about ?
#Text=" Pakku says : " I 'm sorry , I think there 's been a misunderstanding .
#Text=You did n't tell me your friend was a girl .
#Text=In our tribe , it is forbidden for women to learn waterbending .
#Text="
